website_summaries.verdict: A nice choice for a bargain price.
pros: You get six 3-pound bags for a great price
Formulated with peppermint oil, rosemary oil, and spearmint oil to provide relaxing a scent
Long-lasting scent lingers so you can enjoy it as long as you stay in the bath
cons: Has additional synthetic fragrance, so it is not appropriate for those with sensitivities

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as the way-more-expensive brands I have used. The reviews show just about an equal number complaining that the lavender smell is too strong or too weak. I think the company erred on the side of caution in making the scent lighter. I'm perfectly content with the scent level. When I want a stronger lavender scent, I add a few drops of essential lavender oil. (Mind you, I have an enormous corner tub.) I ordered this instead of the Amazon brand I last ordered to give it a try. I do like the bag closure and scent on this one better. This is the one that I'll be buying in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JaneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: these have "fragrance"
customer_reviews.text: I am sure the epsom salt is good, but had to cancel my subscription because of the 'questionable' ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: copper

customer_reviews.title: Buy the case you won't regret it, best for muscle soreness and fibromyalgia
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my bath salts Helps great with my fibromyalgia and muscle pain. Scented are the best if you like that. Plain works the same... Buy a case!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Hijab Hippie

customer_reviews.title: Good Price, convenient to use.
customer_reviews.text: The Product comes in 3 lb. bags which makes it very easy to approximate the amount you wish to use. The scent is light and not disturbingly strong. Personally, I prefer non-scented, but will buy again trying different scents.
customer_reviews.author: Booby Marcinkowski

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Comparable to Dr Teals which is what ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Comparable to Dr Teals which is what I usually purchase. Love the lavender scent which is not over powering. Affords nice relaxing foot or bath soak. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: wanda

customer_reviews.title: Great bath salts
customer_reviews.text: Love these bath salts. I have tried lots including expensive bath bombs and this is probably my favorite. I love it so much I even take cool baths in the heat of the summer. I used to only take baths in the winter when it was cold. A bags lasts a long time too. Smells great and Epsom salts is supposed to be good for you. Try it, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nature lover

customer_reviews.title: Smells very nice but I don't think it does much for muscle ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells very nice but I don't think it does much for muscle aches. I've never had much success with any epsom salts but if you don't care about that, it smells lovely.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyPK

customer_reviews.title: Not as aromatic as Dr. Teals. Compares to solimo
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as aromatic as Dr. Teals. The lavender smell is only present when putting the salt in the bath then disappears. Compares to the brand Solimo but is more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Karlin

customer_reviews.title: Repeat purchases because I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product for a couple years now and I love it! The scent is amazing, leaves my skin feeling clean and soft and makes my body feel relaxed and less tense.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Smells lovely and it’s salt
customer_reviews.text: Good smell, good value. I bathe a lot to help with my medical conditions and this salt allows me to enjoy the benefits of a good soak without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Bulk epsom salt, subtle scent but pleasant
customer_reviews.text: It's fairly inexpensive and has a fairly nice scent. It's not very strong to me
customer_reviews.author: David Heberer

customer_reviews.title: it is not a great salt - weak smell and very fast dissolving
customer_reviews.text: it is not a great salt - weak smell and very fast dissolving! but it does the work for the price
customer_reviews.author: EPS

customer_reviews.title: Smell from essential oils disappears instantly
customer_reviews.text: Dissolves quickly. The smell from the added essential oils disappears almost as soon as you put it in the water. Might as well purchase a big bag of plain Epsom for a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: AkAhathor

customer_reviews.title: Is ok
customer_reviews.text: Broke out wife and son when we used it. Foams up real bad.
customer_reviews.author: jerry d.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, not slot of rosemary scent
customer_reviews.text: Not quite the rosemary heavy scent I was looking for but decent value
customer_reviews.author: JSun

customer_reviews.title: Love Lavender
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent of Lavender and Epsom Salts helpful for my Fibromyalgia.. win win
customer_reviews.author: Janina

customer_reviews.title: It smells just like Dr. Teals at a fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.text: It smells just like Dr.Teals at a fraction of the cost. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little weak scented
customer_reviews.text: Smells very nice, only gave it 2 stars because I wish it smelled a little stronger. It's a little weak in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these salts!! They smell amazing, very relaxing, and you cannot beat the price! Very, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Anne Mog

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Scent!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best smelling Epsom salts ever! They don't leave me feeling slimy either!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. They worked really well and this is a great value. Scent is very soothing. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RBD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent amount for price
customer_reviews.text: Love using epsom soaks for sore muscles. This has a pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: kelly f.

customer_reviews.title: Check scent
customer_reviews.text: It would have been great but I ordered Lavender and received eucalyptus which is very strong smelling and not very relaxing
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Dislike
customer_reviews.text: Not as good and Dr. Teals at all, weak essential fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Check ingredients before buying
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a nice product but lists “fragrance” as main ingredient. Note sure I want that absorbing into my blood stream!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bath
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this product. Epsom salts is therapeutic for skin and lavender smell is so relaxing. Perfect bath product.
customer_reviews.author: Dee C.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Lack of smell...didnt see any difference using this product.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for my daughter who has ADHD every night. Helpful fact- soaking your child in Epsom Salts provides a significant amount of magnesium that their body absorbs. I was very pleased with the price, and the lavender smell is very soothing. (And I am an essential oil distributor- so I am picky about my lavender!) The price is very reasonable, and my daughter looks forward to her nightly "chill out soaks" as she calls them. I would recommend this product absolutely.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea V.

customer_reviews.title: Great Price - Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big advocate of Epsom Salt baths. I take them frequently to help prevent and help muscle soreness from working out. This product had a minty smell and 1 bag last me 2-3 baths - so the 6 bags isn't that big of a purchase depending on how often to you use it. This is just as good as the brands at a much better price!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Has a chemical smell...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The scent is extremely off-putting, in the way that something’s been added that shouldn’t be in there. Smells very chemically when you open the bag, so it isn’t quite like the nicer brands...my nose is saying Don’t trust this stuff so I’m not buying anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DoubleRipoff so watch out
customer_reviews.text: It is like paying five times the price. I ordered SIX- THRE(3) pound bags and I received Six (1.5) pound bags for about $22 which is half what was advertised. You can buy 8 lbs for about $4 anywhere Epsom salts
customer_reviews.author: K——-L—-P————

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: I have used these before and love them. Add this and 1 cup of baking soda to the bath for great help with muscle aches and pains.. works wonders on my fibro.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for a great product. I kickbox, and in my 40’s it’s hard on the body. I soak once a week with this stuff and it keeps me far less sore than I would be otherwise
customer_reviews.author: abriggs

customer_reviews.title: Was only ok
customer_reviews.text: The scent wasn't overpowering but it wasn't really pleasant either, I feel like other epsom salt brands deliver better on the muscle/therapy soak. This one missed the mark for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper67

customer_reviews.title: Scent is a bit Off
customer_reviews.text: The scent is a bit uhm...chemical-y for my taste. However, the value is great. It does take a bit of stirring to get it to dissolve in bath water. Overall pleased with purchase. Will stick to other scents.
customer_reviews.author: cats_bell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great price
customer_reviews.text: This epsom salt soak is my new favorite bath soak for the Fall and Winter season. Great natural scent, not too strong. Epsom/magnesium baths are terrific for after workouts to soothe sore muscles and if anyone in the family has a cold or the flu, this is great for aches and pains and helps to clear the sinuses.
customer_reviews.author: A Muse

customer_reviews.title: Best price
customer_reviews.text: Pleasant scent and best price per pound--trust me, I've compared, . I LOVE my jetted tub baths. I sit and read for an hour or more--the salts just make it all that more luxurious. I wish they offered my scents.
customer_reviews.author: SandyM

customer_reviews.title: Great scent!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent! Works as Epsom salt should. Great value. Will continue buying every time.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Great product/price is great too!
customer_reviews.text: I use scented Epsom salt in my baths on a regular basis. It’s great for pain and overworked muscles. This is s great product and priced well.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Sumner/thefoothillsfarmhouse

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice and they smell amazing! Perfect for the bath and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. The amount is perfect for monthly deliveries since I take a lot of soothing baths.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Your feet will thank you
customer_reviews.text: Soak my feet as often as possible using this epsom salt. The eucalyptus aroma is very refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: A S Abramson

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Great smell and seems to be nice quality. Lot of product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Just buy plain Epsom salt instead
customer_reviews.text: Might as well just buy plain Epsom salt. It's just lightly scented stuff so you don't get any benefits from any kind of essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing!!
customer_reviews.text: Very Relaxing to soak in the tub with sore muscles!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: NO SMELL OR SOOTHINGNESS
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT HAS NO SMELL TO IT AND NO MEDICINAL HELP, WOULD NEVER BUY AGAIN, SHOULD HAVE STUCK WITH DR.TEALS AND YOU REALLY DO GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Yes it’s lavender Epson salt but it falls way short
customer_reviews.text: It’s cheap and it’s Epson salt which is the only reason I give it to stars but as far as lavender goes, it smells like lavender when you open the bag but the scent magically pretty much disappears when you pour it in the tub. If you’re trying to save money yes this might be the way to go but if you’re really looking for a lavender scented Epson salt, go with the San Francisco brand that has lavender. It’s more expensive but you really do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: SLB

customer_reviews.title: The smell is gone
customer_reviews.text: The lavender smell is gone as soon as it hits the water. Better off with normal epsom.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Love the small ingredient list! Makes an excellent bath! Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: buckwheatkp

product_meta.title: Mountain Falls Epsom Salt Therapy Soak, Rosemary, Peppermint and Spearmint Scented, 3 Pound (Pack of 6)
product_meta.description: Color:Rosemary MintDiscover the relaxing spa-like qualities of Mountain Falls Therapy Soak in your bath. Let this naturally-derived Epsom Salt enhance your soaking experience while you relax. Just dissolve Epsom Salt into warm bath water, settle in, and experience relief and relaxation.
feature_bullets: Soothing relief from overexertion and stiffness
If you like Dr. Teal’s Wellness Therapy with Rosemary & Mint, we invite you to try Mountain Falls Epsom Salt Therapy Soak, Rosemary, Peppermint and Spearmint Scented

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
